data.title: Latest news
data.text:
May 5:

I have some problems with the FTP server, please be patient.

Here are some details of the new cd: (NOT OFFICIAL!!)

May 17:

I have some problems with the FTP server, please be patient.

here are some details of the new cd: (April Fools Day article!! THIS IS NOT REAL!!!)

It's gonna be a double CD, the first is a conceptual piece - the album's

Called "Victorian England under Martian Rule" and the first CD follow's the theme of that:

CD1-

Preternatural Terror (hell on earth) Going Insanus

Saturn's Ring

AveLuna

Proud Cutty sark (cutting thru waves as tho they were virgin flesh)

Go Go Gothic Gatling Gun!

Triumph of British Steel

CD2

*nothing*

Neck Romancer

Reflections of a wilting poet's rose

Sinderella

Hansel & Metal

Weeping on statues

Triarchy of triassic terror: Funereal fossil fantasie.......comprised of:-

Shriek of the pterodactyl

Hill of the diplodoci

where the wild things are.

this is probably the new title of the new cd the title is: "Midian"

Once again i can't confirm if this is true, i think we have to wait a little longer.....

June 27:

Well you might have noticed that the page was gone for a while, it's fixed again. Some good news now! the FTP server is UP AND RUNNING. the info to log in is below.

HOST ADRESS: 212.115.137.106

USER ID: cradle666

PASSWORD: embrace

PORT: 21

On line is the Dynamo '99 live show expect more soon.

also if you have a nice bootleg (doesn't have to be a COF bootleg) please upload it to the UPLOAD directory.

only MP3's please!

Some words form Alex Chandon;

September 3:

The release date for the new cd "Midian"is 31 Oktober.

The FPT server is running again here are the details:

HOST ADRESS: 212.115.137.106

USER ID: cradle666

PASSWORD: embrace

PORT: 21

Please note that not all the bootlegs are available yet as MP3 i'm working on this. if you have some good bootlegs, feel free to upload them to the FTP server i have made a special directory called UPLOAD, use this to upload the bootlegs. upload only MP3's in 160bps!! or higher.

You can also order the bootlegs on cd, please go to http://www.vamprecords.com for more info.

September 13

The tracklisting for Midian has been released. The album will be made up of 9 songs (including 1 instrumental) plus 2 interludes. The tracks are titled as follows:

- Her Ghost in the Fog

- Saffron's Curse

- Amore Morte

- Death Magik for Adepts

- Lord Abortion

- Tortured Soul Asylum

- Cthulu Dawn

- Raven (Sous Reserve)

- Satanic Mantra (instrumental)

Additionally, a Sabbat cover, 'For Those Who Died', will appear as a bonus track on the Japanese release.

below some artwork of the new cd "MIDIAN"

October 28

The new cd "Midian" released today, i have it right here!

The track list is:

At the gates of Midian

Cthulhu Dawn

Saffron's Curse

Death Magick For Adepts

Lord Abortion

Amor E Morte

Creatures That Kissed

In Cold Mirrors

Her Ghost In The Fog

Satanic Mantra

Tearing The Veil From Grace

Tortured Soul Asylum.

Here is some artwork:

The FTP server is shut down for temporary maintanence. More about this next week.
